job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you passionate about leveraging AI to revolutionize customer interactions? We are looking for a Prompt Engineer to join a dynamic, forward-thinking team dedicated to developing cutting-edge AI assistants for our client.
       Your expertise will play a crucial role in streamlining administrative tasks, enabling advisors to focus on what truly matters-delivering outstanding customer service.

     * Collaborate in an Agile scrum team to design and implement scalable GenAI solutions that enhance both customer experience and advisor efficiency.
     * Develop advanced AI assistant technologies, utilizing your expertise in AI architectures and Prompt Engineering.
     * Conduct rigorous testing and validation to ensure high-quality, reliable AI solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Prompt Engineer

Are you passionate about leveraging AI to revolutionize customer interactions? We are looking for a Prompt Engineer to join a dynamic, forward-thinking team dedicated to developing cutting-edge AI assistants for our client.
       Your expertise will play a crucial role in streamlining administrative tasks, enabling advisors to focus on what truly matters-delivering outstanding customer service.

     * Collaborate in an Agile scrum team to design and implement scalable GenAI solutions that enhance both customer experience and advisor efficiency.
     * Develop advanced AI assistant technologies, utilizing your expertise in AI architectures and Prompt Engineering.
     * Conduct rigorous testing and validation to ensure high-quality, reliable AI solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing AI assistants and GenAI solutions, utilizing expertise in AI architectures and Prompt Engineering. It highlights collaboration in Agile teams to enhance customer experience and advisor efficiency, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on building and deploying generative AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design and implement scalable GenAI solutions' and 'develop advanced AI assistant technologies' points towards building and integrating AI capabilities into functional systems.
job_tasks.phrase: design and implement scalable GenAI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop advanced AI assistant technologies' indicates the creation of software systems powered by AI.
The core responsibility of 'Prompt Engineering' directly relates to the fine-tuning and optimization of generative models.
The phrase 'Conduct rigorous testing and validation to ensure high-quality, reliable AI solutions' is a key part of the MLOps lifecycle, ensuring production readiness.

The mention of 'revolutionize customer interactions' and 'streamlining administrative tasks, enabling advisors to focus on what truly matters-delivering outstanding customer service' shows an understanding of business goals and how AI can address them.
The phrase 'enhance both customer experience and advisor efficiency' demonstrates an understanding of business outcomes and how AI solutions should align with them.
job_tasks.phrase: enhance both customer experience and advisor efficiency

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate in an Agile scrum team
passionate about leveraging AI to revolutionize customer interactions
